description: The action to list the replicated bots.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The request for the unique bot IDs in the list of replicated bots.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: the unique bot IDs in the list of replicated bots.

nested_items.name: sourceRegion
nested_items.description: The source region of the source bots in the list of replicated bots.

nested_items.name: botReplicaSummaries
nested_items.description: The summary details for the replicated bots.

nested_items.name: replicaRegion
nested_items.description: The replica region used in the replication statuses summary.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The creation time and date for the replicated bots.

nested_items.name: botReplicaStatus
nested_items.description: The operation status for the replicated bot applicable.

nested_items.name: failureReasons
nested_items.description: The reasons for the failure for the replicated bot.
